title: Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore: Goods & Services
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Goods & Services              Goods & Services      Explore the shops and galleries in Glen Arbor, Empire, and other cities and villages in the area. The local chambers of commerce offer information on many goods and services are available, including lodging, food, gas stations, grocery stores and other shopping, and other activities in the area.Cell Phone ServiceDo not rely on cell phones inside the park; many locations have no service. Pay phones have been removed from most locations.Gas stationsYou can find gas stations in Empire, Glen Arbor, and Leland, and in other cities and villages near the Lakeshore.Post OfficesThe following Post Offices are located near the Lakeshore:Empire, MI - 10234 W. Front St. in downtown EmpireGlen Arbor, MI - 6456 W. Harbor Hwy on M-22 in Glen ArborHonor, MI - 10982 Main St. on M-31 in HonorFrankfort, MI - 615 Main St. in downtown FrankfortLeland, MI - 122 N. Main St. in Leland.
